content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure appears to be a toy train set with multiple components:
- Total blocks used: approximately 15-17 blocks
- The structure has 2-3 layers in most sections

## Spatial Relationships
The structure can be broken down into several key parts:
1. A main train body consisting of:
   - Red arched base pieces (forming a train undercarriage)
   - Blue cube with orange triangular roof (front cabin)
   - Orange cube with orange triangular roof (rear cabin)
   - Yellow semi-cylindrical blocks (middle section/boiler)
   - Yellow rectangular blocks standing vertically (smokestacks)
   - Green blocks for details

2. A ramp/slide section:
   - Orange ramp connecting to the train

3. A tunnel structure:
   - Red hollow rectangular blocks forming a tunnel
   - Green horizontal bar crossing through the tunnel

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the target structure, I need the following blocks:

1. Block #1 - Red arch piece (used multiple times for train base)
2. Block #2 - Red curved piece (appears to be part of the train)
3. Block #3 - Red arch piece (used for the tunnel)
4. Block #4 - Blue cube (for the front cabin)
5. Block #5 - Green cube (for details)
6. Block #6 - Orange cube (for the rear cabin)
7. Block #7 - Green horizontal bar (for the tunnel crosspiece)
8. Block #8 - Green vertical piece (for details)
9. Block #9 - Yellow horizontal piece (for details)
10. Block #10 - Yellow vertical piece (for smokestacks)
11. Block #11 - Yellow semi-cylindrical piece (for the train boiler)
12. Block #12 - Yellow small vertical piece (for details)
14. Block #14 - Orange triangular roof (for cabin roofs)
15. Block #15 - Orange triangular piece (for details)
16. Block #16 - Orange ramp piece (for the slide)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 1
   Step3: Move block with index 1
   Step4: Move block with index 2
   Step5: Move block with index 4
   Step6: Move block with index 14
   Step7: Move block with index 11
   Step8: Move block with index 11
   Step9: Move block with index 6
   Step10: Move block with index 14
   Step11: Move block with index 5
   Step12: Move block with index 8
   Step13: Move block with index 10
   Step14: Move block with index 10
   Step15: Move block with index 16
   Step16: Move block with index 3
   Step17: Move block with index 7
   Step18: Move block with index 3
}
```
